STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay Ahead of the Curve with Real-Time Insights
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear what our users have to say about our Ethereum transaction monitoring app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for tracking new transactions on Ethereum. The real-time updates and customizable alerts make it a must-have tool for anyone serious about the Ethereum ecosystem.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've tried multiple Ethereum transaction monitoring apps, but none come close to the accuracy and user-friendly interface of this one. It has become an essential part of my daily workflow.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As an Ethereum enthusiast, I can't imagine not having this app in my arsenal. It keeps me informed about the latest transactions and helps me stay ahead of the curve.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our Ethereum transaction finder app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app allows you to discover new Ethereum transactions in real-time. It scans the Ethereum blockchain and notifies you of any incoming or outgoing transfers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We use advanced algorithms to continuously monitor the Ethereum network for new transaction data. When a new transfer is detected, our app immediately alerts you with the details.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: For each new transaction, you'll receive the sender and receiver addresses, the Ethereum value transferred, the transaction hash, and the block number it was included in.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our basic transaction monitoring service is completely free. We offer premium paid plans with additional features like transaction history and custom alerts.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Just download our app and enter the Ethereum address you want to monitor. We'll handle the rest and notify you of any new transactions for that address.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay up-to-date with the latest Ethereum transactions as they happen. EtherScan provides live monitoring and notifications for new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge technology that monitors the Ethereum blockchain for new transactions as they happen, giving you instant access to the latest data.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our powerful filtering system allows you to narrow down your search to specific transaction types, values, addresses, and more, ensuring you only see the data that's relevant to you.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Never miss a beat with our customizable notification system. Set up alerts for specific transaction criteria, and get notified instantly when new data matches your preferences.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Built with industry-leading security practices, our platform ensures your data is always protected and accessible, giving you peace of mind in the ever-evolving world of blockchain.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Our intuitive and user-friendly interface makes it easy to navigate and understand the complex world of Ethereum transactions, even for those new to the space.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Seamlessly integrate our powerful transaction monitoring capabilities into your own applications with our well-documented and easy-to-use APIs, designed with developers in mind.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Finder
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: An Ethereum transaction is a cryptographically signed instruction sent by an account to transfer ether (ETH) or execute a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does your app find new Ethereum transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app continuously monitors the Ethereum network and indexes all newly added transactions in real-time, allowing you to quickly discover and analyze the latest activity.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What information is provided for each transaction?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: For each new Ethereum transaction, we provide details such as the sender and recipient addresses, amount of ETH transferred, gas fees paid, and any associated data like smart contract inputs/outputs.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I filter or search for specific types of transactions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app allows you to apply various filters to find transactions matching certain criteria, such as transactions involving specific addresses, smart contract interactions, or value ranges.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay up-to-date with the latest Ethereum transactions as they happen. Our app provides instantaneous notification of new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Easily filter transactions by address, value, gas price and more. Powerful search capabilities allow you to quickly find specific transactions of interest.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Clean and simple UI design makes navigating and analyzing Ethereum transactions a breeze. Save time with seamless access to vital transaction data.
